name: iOS 15.1 and iPadOS 15.1
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue existed in the processing of ICC profiles. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Alexandru-Vlad Niculae and Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An uncontrolled format string issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Gongyu Ma of Hangzhou Dianzi University

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may disclose user information
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted PDF may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Unpacking a maliciously crafted archive may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Simon Huang (@HuangShaomang) and pjf of IceSword Lab of Qihoo 360

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of Alibaba Security Pandora Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access information about a user's contacts

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to view contacts from the lock screen
advisories.description: A lock screen issue allowed access to contacts on a locked device. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to determine characteristics of a user's password in a secure text entry field
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious website using Content Security Policy reports may be able to leak information via redirect behavior
advisories.description: An information leakage issue was addressed.
